name: Men's Graphic T-Shirt
description: This is a 100% cotton graphic t-shirt for men. It features a unique print design that adds a touch of personality to your casual look. The shirt is available in various sizes, ensuring a comfortable fit for all. It's machine washable and retains its shape and color even after multiple washes.

name: Women's Denim Jeans
description: These are skinny denim jeans designed for modern women. They are made from high-quality denim material that offers comfort and durability. The jeans feature a classic five-pocket design and a stylish skinny fit that flatters your figure. They are perfect for both casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Unisex Winter Jacket
description: This is a warm and cozy unisex winter jacket. It's made from premium materials that keep you warm in cold weather. The jacket features a zip-up front, a detachable hood, and multiple pockets for convenience. It's available in multiple colors, allowing you to choose the one that best suits your style.

name: Children's Raincoat
description: This is a durable and waterproof raincoat for children. It's made from lightweight material that's easy to pack and carry. The raincoat features a hood and long sleeves to protect your child from the rain. It's available in various fun colors that your child will love.

name: Men's Formal Shirt
description: This is a men's formal shirt, perfect for office wear and formal occasions. It's made from a comfortable and breathable material that keeps you comfortable all day. The shirt features a classic collar, long sleeves, and a full-button placket. It's available in various sizes and colors.

name: Women's Maxi Dress
description: This is a women's maxi dress, perfect for summer outings and beach vacations. It's made from a lightweight and breathable material that keeps you cool in hot weather. The dress features a beautiful floral print, a round neck, and a comfortable loose fit.

name: Children's Graphic T-Shirt
description: This is a fun and colorful graphic t-shirt for children. Made from soft, breathable cotton, it ensures comfort for all-day wear. The t-shirt features a playful graphic that kids will love. It's machine washable and retains its vibrant colors even after multiple washes.

name: Children's Denim Jeans
description: These are stylish and comfortable denim jeans for children. They are made from high-quality denim that's both durable and soft on the skin. The jeans feature an adjustable waistband to accommodate growing kids and a classic five-pocket design for a touch of style.

name: Children's Winter Jacket
description: This is a warm and cozy winter jacket for children. It's made from premium materials that keep your child warm in cold weather. The jacket features a zip-up front, a detachable hood, and multiple pockets for convenience. It's available in various fun colors that your child will love.

name: Children's School Uniform
description: This is a set of school uniform for children. It's made from a comfortable and breathable material that's perfect for all-day wear. The set includes a shirt, trousers/skirt, and a tie. It's designed to meet the requirements of most school dress codes.
